verses.verse: Thus all <S%H3605><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> that <S%H834><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was finished: <S%H7999><s%> and Solomon <S%H8010><s%> brought in <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> all the things <S%H6944><s%> that David <S%H1732><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> had dedicated; <S%H6944><s%> and the silver, <S%H3701><s%> and the gold, <S%H2091><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the instruments, <S%H3627><s%> put <S%H5414><s%> he among the treasures <S%H214><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> assembled <S%H6950><s%> <S%H853><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the tribes, <S%H4294><s%> the chief <S%H5387><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> to bring up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> out of the city <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5892><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is Zion. <S%H6726><s%>

Wherefore all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> assembled themselves <S%H6950><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> in the feast <S%H2282><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> was in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month. <S%H2320><s%>
And all <S%H3605><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came; <S%H935><s%> and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> took up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark. <S%H727><s%>

And they brought up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark, <S%H727><s%> and the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> vessels <S%H3627><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were in the tabernacle, <S%H168><s%> these did the priests <S%H3548><s%> and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> bring up. <S%H5927><s%>

Also king <S%H4428><s%> Solomon, <S%H8010><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that were assembled <S%H3259><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> him before <S%H6440><s%> the ark, <S%H727><s%> sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> sheep <S%H6629><s%> and oxen, <S%H1241><s%> which <S%H834><s%> could not <S%H3808><s%> be told <S%H5608><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> numbered <S%H4487><s%> for multitude. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7230><s%>

And the priests <S%H3548><s%> brought in <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his place, <S%H4725><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the oracle <S%H1687><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the most holy <S%H6944><s%> <S%H6944><s%> place, even under <S%H413><s%> <S%H8478><s%> the wings <S%H3671><s%> of the cherubims: <S%H3742><s%>

For the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> spread forth <S%H1961><s%> <S%H6566><s%> their wings <S%H3671><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> of the ark, <S%H727><s%> and the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> and the staves <S%H905><s%> thereof above. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%>

And they drew out <S%H748><s%> the staves <S%H905><s%> of the ark, that the ends <S%H7218><s%> of the staves <S%H905><s%> were seen <S%H7200><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the oracle; <S%H1687><s%> but they were not <S%H3808><s%> seen <S%H7200><s%> without. <S%H2351><s%> And there <S%H8033><s%> it is <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

There was nothing <S%H369><s%> in the ark <S%H727><s%> save <S%H7535><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> put <S%H5414><s%> therein at Horeb, <S%H2722><s%> when <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant with <S%H5973><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> when they came out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when the priests <S%H3548><s%> were come out <S%H3318><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> place: (for <S%H3588><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> that were present <S%H4672><s%> were sanctified, <S%H6942><s%> and did not <S%H369><s%> then wait <S%H8104><s%> by course: <S%H4256><s%>

Also the Levites <S%H3881><s%> which were the singers, <S%H7891><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them of Asaph, <S%H623><s%> of Heman, <S%H1968><s%> of Jeduthun, <S%H3038><s%> with their sons <S%H1121><s%> and their brethren, <S%H251><s%> being arrayed <S%H3847><s%> in white linen, <S%H948><s%> having cymbals <S%H4700><s%> and psalteries <S%H5035><s%> and harps, <S%H3658><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> at the east end <S%H4217><s%> of the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and with <S%H5973><s%> them a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> priests <S%H3548><s%> sounding <S%H2690><s%> with trumpets: ) <S%H2689><s%>

It came even to pass, <S%H1961><s%> as the trumpeters <S%H2690><s%> and singers <S%H7891><s%> were as one, <S%H259><s%> to make one <S%H259><s%> sound <S%H6963><s%> to be heard <S%H8085><s%> in praising <S%H1984><s%> and thanking <S%H3034><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and when they lifted up <S%H7311><s%> their voice <S%H6963><s%> with the trumpets <S%H2689><s%> and cymbals <S%H4700><s%> and instruments <S%H3627><s%> of music, <S%H7892><s%> and praised <S%H1984><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> saying, For <S%H3588><s%> he is good; <S%H2896><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth forever: <S%H5769><s%> that then the house <S%H1004><s%> was filled <S%H4390><s%> with a cloud, <S%H6051><s%> even the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%>

So that the priests <S%H3548><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> by reason of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the cloud: <S%H6051><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had filled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H853><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>
